name: Let It Happen (itch)
description:
A toy based on anti-corruption protests in Russia.

Place the protesters and the police on the level and press "let it happen" button. What exactly will happen depends on Unreal Engine's physics settings and the random processes, which is something funny and buggy.

The toy is in an early stage of development, but you can check out this prototype that demonstrates the main idea. Any feedback is very appreciated.

Controls:

WASD + mouse

right click to spawn a policeman

left click to spawn a protester

left click on to let it happen

Also you can change or mute the music by clicking on the speaker. Left click on the column to climb it.
